episodes.title: Landmark Worldwide Needs to Apologize to its Black Leadership with Jennifer Clarke
episodes.description:
Our guest in our next YouTube video/podcast is former SELP Leader and Staff Member Jennifer Clarke. In her words, this is her "Love letter to the Landmark graduates."

This is an important conversation as Jennifer shares her views and what the final straw was for her with Landmark after being a leader and advocate for decades.

This conversation is distinct from our previous ones, it is eye-opening and essential to our message of calling for change and accountability.

We applaud Jennifer.

episodes.title: Letting Go of Landmark and (Re)Learning Who You Are
episodes.description:
In this conversation, our guest shares about deconstructing and letting go of Landmark. We will examine the Landmark Worldwide and Landmark Forum experience, and inquire about the tools obtained. Are they needed to live a successful and self-expressed life? 

Our guest's story also highlights what it could like to relearn who you are after leaving the Landmark ecosystem.

episodes.title: I was a "HARD NO" to doing the Landmark Forum for a year....
episodes.description:
Tonight, we speak with a recent Seminar Leader participant who's family got swept up in Landmark Worldwide and recently left the organization- trying to make sense of what just happened. 

This conversation opens up questions about trusting your own gut, social pressure, and should people be coached to be unreasonable at the cost of their family and relationships?

episodes.title: What is "Love Bombing?" Does it happen at Landmark or The Landmark Forum?"
episodes.description:
New live streams most Tuesdays at 8p.m. central, 6p.m. pacific.
This week we explore falling in love with Landmark Worldwide and then it all falling apart on you. Does this fit in the concept of "Love Bombing?"

episodes.title: Top 5 Changes Landmark Worldwide Needs to make
episodes.description: Landmark has the ability to change its organization and the reports of verbal abuse, exploitation, hypocrisy and misinformation. Tonight we invite Landmark to "get off it" and end practices that have impacted people so many people's lives.

episodes.title: Former Landmark Worldwide Staff Member Opens Up About Devastating Experience
episodes.description: A former staff member approach me to tell their story about the corporate culture of Landmark Worldwide (also know as Landmark Education) and the Landmark Forum.
